story:
Once upon a time, in a bustling Middle-Eastern village, there lived a young girl named Layla. Layla was known for her kindness and compassion toward all living beings, whether they were people, animals, or even plants.

One warm evening, as Layla prepared for bed, she noticed a wounded bird outside her window. The poor bird had injured its wing and couldn't fly. Without hesitation, Layla gently picked up the bird and took it inside to care for it.

Layla made a cozy nest for the bird and carefully tended to its injury, showing it love and kindness every step of the way. She fed it, sang to it, and stayed by its side until it fell asleep, feeling safe and loved.

As she gazed out the window, Layla saw the moon shining brightly in the night sky and whispered a wish for the bird to heal and fly again. Little did she know that her pure heart and selfless actions had caught the attention of a magical being.

In the middle of the night, Layla was awoken by a soft glow in her room. To her surprise, a beautiful fairy stood before her, her wings shimmering in the moonlight. The fairy smiled at Layla and said, "Your kindness and compassion have touched the heart of the world. As a reward for your good deeds, I shall grant you a wish."

Layla's eyes widened with wonder and joy as she thought of the one thing she desired most. Without hesitation, she whispered her wish to the fairy: "I wish for all living beings to be happy and safe, just like the bird I helped tonight."

The fairy's eyes twinkled with approval, and with a wave of her wand, she granted Layla's wish. From that moment on, the village was filled with peace, harmony, and love, and Layla knew that her kindness had made a difference in the world.

As Layla drifted back to sleep, she felt a warm breeze of gratitude surround her, knowing that her acts of compassion had created a ripple of goodness that would forever touch the lives of those around her.

And so, dear child, remember the power of kindness and compassion, for like Layla, you too have the ability to make the world a better place with your heart full of love. Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may your heart always shine brightly with kindness.
